titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Lambeth, April 21, 1645, at the funerall of that learned and polemicall divine, Daniel Featley, Doctor in Divinity, late preacher there with a short relation of his life and death / by William Leo [sic] ...
titleStmt.author: Loe, William, d. 1645.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: A sermon preached at the funerall of Dr. Featley.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
